thread.title: Donations accepted for 86 th Annual Ladies Board Rummage Sale
thread.title_full: Donations accepted for 86 th Annual Ladies Board Rummage Sale

author: cthatcher
title: Donations accepted for 86 th Annual Ladies Board Rummage Sale
text:
Donations accepted for 86 th Annual Ladies Board Rummage Sale
The Ladies Board of Inova Loudoun Hospital is officially accepting donations for the 86th Annual Ladies Board Rummage Sale. Donations will be collected, rain or shine, on Saturday, Sept. 13, from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. at three locations:
- Inova Loudoun Hospital, 44045 Riverside Parkway, Lansdowne
- Inova Loudoun Medical Campus (Cornwall), 224 Cornwall Street, Leesburg
- Loudoun Valley High School, 340 N Maple Ave., Purcellville
Many kinds of donations are welcome including antiques, jewelry, furniture (will only be accepted at the Cornwall location), sports equipment, books and media, clothing, home goods, holiday items, linens, tools, pet supplies and toys.
Organizers request that items be packed in boxes with lids or flaps closed and that batteries be removed from any items. Only clothes and non-breakable items should be placed in plastic bags and tied shut. For a complete list of acceptable items, please visit LadiesBoard.org/Rummage-Sale.
Donations will be offered for sale at the 86th Annual Ladies Board Rummage Sale on Saturday, Oct. 18 and Sunday, Oct. 19 at the Loudoun County Fairgrounds, 17558 Dry Mill Road, Leesburg. Enjoy an exclusive VIP Shopping experience on Friday, Oct. 17. Tickets are available at LadiesBoard.org—act quickly, they’re going fast.
Net proceeds support Inova Loudoun Hospital and the Ladies Board Nursing Scholarship Fund. The Ladies Board raises several hundred thousand dollars each year for special needs equipment at Inova Loudoun Hospital and has awarded over $2.5 million in nursing scholarships since the program began.
Community
Comments
Any name-calling and profanity will be taken off. The webmaster reserves the right to remove any offensive posts.
